briefTitle: Laser Acupuncture for Postpartum Weight Retention

outcomeMeasures.title: Body Mass Index (BMI)
outcomeMeasures.description: The BMI was assessed by an evaluator who was blinded to the intervention details from the beginning through study completion, up to 3 weeks, and 3 months after study completion.

outcomeMeasures.title: Waist-to-buttock Ratio (WBR)
outcomeMeasures.description: The WBR was assessed by an evaluator who was blinded to the intervention details from the beginning through study completion, up to 3 weeks.

outcomeMeasures.title: Body Fat Percentage (BFP)
outcomeMeasures.description: The BFP was assessed by an evaluator who was blinded to the intervention details from the beginning through study completion, up to 3 weeks.
